trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The ListSortDescriptionCollection class is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface.
trans-unit.target: A classe de listsortdescriptioncollection é utilizada pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The ListSortDescriptionCollection is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: O listsortdescriptioncollection é é só de leitura que uma vez criada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>é só de leitura uma vez criada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class with the specified array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> classe com a matriz especificada de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>é só de leitura uma vez criada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Exemplo

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects to be contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> objetos contido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> contém um valor específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>Localizar na coleção.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Object>é encontrado na coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os conteúdos da coleção para a matriz especificada, que começa com o índice de matriz de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: The destination array for the items copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de destino para os itens copiados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the destination array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz de destino em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice do item especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>Localizar na coleção.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice da value se encontrado na lista; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if you attempt to set an item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>é só de leitura uma vez criada e irá gerar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>se tentar definir um item.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get or set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> obter ou definir na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> com o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: An item is set in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>, which is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Um item está definido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>, que é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à coleção é thread seguro.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true`, because once constructed, the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre `true`, uma vez depois de criada, a coleção é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current instance that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância atual, que pode ser utilizada para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns the current instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>, because this collection, once constructed, does not allow public access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação devolve a instância atual do <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>, porque esta coleção, uma vez criada, não permite o acesso de público para a lista subjacente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the ICollection.SyncRoot method, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método ICollection.SyncRoot, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> que podem ser utilizados para iterar através da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que podem ser utilizados para iterar através da coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have an IList.Add method.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>interface, tem de ter um método IList.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, adding items to the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe representa uma coleção só de leitura, adicionar itens à coleção é uma operação inválida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O item a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que foi inserido o novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Clear method.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>interface, tem de ter um método IList.Clear.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, clearing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe representa uma coleção só de leitura, desmarcando itens da coleção é uma operação inválida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um item na coleção de um índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Insert method.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>interface, tem de ter um método IList.Insert.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, inserting items into the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe representa um só de leitura coleção, inserir itens da coleção é uma operação inválida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get or set in the collection
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> obter ou definir na coleção

trans-unit.source: The item to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O item a inserir na coleção.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only once constructed and will, therefore, always have a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é só de leitura, uma vez criada e, por conseguinte, terão sempre um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>é só de leitura uma vez criada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que é só de leitura não permite a adição, remoção ou modificação de elementos depois de criar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get in the collection
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> obter na coleção

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> com o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of an item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência de um item da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Remove method.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>interface, tem de ter um método IList.Remove.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, removing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe representa um só de leitura coleção, remover itens da coleção é uma operação inválida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O item a remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove um item da coleção num índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.RemoveAt method.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>interface, tem de ter um método IList.RemoveAt.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, removing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>classe representa um só de leitura coleção, remover itens da coleção é uma operação inválida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to remove from the collection
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> para remover da coleção

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.
